scripts.test:css: npm run build && find ./dist -name '*.css' -type f | head -10 && echo 'CSS files found above' || echo 'No CSS files found!'
scripts.test:paths: npm run build && grep -r 'ems-beckenboden-therapie' ./dist --include='*.html' || echo 'No GitHub paths found - good!'
scripts.debug:build: npm run build && echo '=== Build Contents ===' && ls -la dist/ && echo '=== CSS Files ===' && find dist -name '*.css' -type f
scripts.build:complete: npm run generate:pdf && npm run build
